title: Mouse Cursor
body:
Hey Folks!

So I just started playing this game again (my old laptop broke so I got a new one) but the problem I'm running into now that I got it up and running is that in game the cursor is too small for me to see, granted I am half blind but I mean this thing is the size of half my pinky nail, where as on my old laptop ir was fairly large and easy to see. Any solutions to this?

Thanks!

replies.body: Are you on a 4K monitor or exceeding 1920x1080 resolution?  They're not currently supported and can cause issues like this, as well as running any 3rd party programs that interact with League.  Reducing your resolution can help fix this up, or setting your DPI to 100%.  Let me know if this helps!
